  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x124

    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x92
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x92 [color=#008000]
        LayoutBR {br} at (0,0) size 0x74
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,74) size 166x18
